item.title:
The Weeknd to @WMag on his past hair and people’s comments on it:
“The hair became an obstacle for me! I went from ‘No one knows who I am’ to ‘Nobody has that hair except The Weeknd.’ I was always trying to hide it. When I finally decided to cut it, everybody said, ‘Don’t do… Show more
item.author: popcrave

item.title:
The Weeknd tells @WMag that his next album will likely be his last as The Weeknd:
“I’m getting ready to close the Weeknd chapter. I’ll still make music, maybe as Abel, maybe as The Weeknd. But I still want to kill The Weeknd… This is something that I have to do. As The Weeknd,… Show more
item.author: popcrave

item.title: Taylor Swift refused to cancel her final Nashville show and performed in the pouring rain after a four-hour lightning delay.
item.author: popcrave

item.title:
Taylor Swift and Matty Healy have been seeing each other after Jack Antonoff reconnected them, @ETnow reports:
“[They] like each other. Taylor has a crush on Matty and they are having a good time hanging out. Matty also thinks Taylor is awesome and incredibly talented, too.”… Show more
item.author: popcrave

item.title:
“Moonlight” by @KaliUchis has reached 100 MILLION streams on Spotify.
It’s her 13th song to achieve this.
item.author: popcrave

item.title:
